solution_line_template: On the first and second days, Nala found {first_day_seashells} + {second_day_seashells} = <<{first_day_seashells}+{second_day_seashells}={seashells_first_two_days}>>{seashells_first_two_days} seashells.
On the third day, she found {seashells_first_two_days} x {multiplier_third_day} = <<{seashells_first_two_days}*{multiplier_third_day}={seashells_third_day}>>{seashells_third_day} seashells.
